participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: A resilient and thoughtful individual who expresses her emotions through dance. She often finds solace in her art and values family connections.
participant_1.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was of.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: A curious and adventurous boy with a unique outlook on life due to his extraordinary abilities. He often grapples with the challenges brought by his condition.
participant_2.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body.

content.text: Hey, are you here? What's up?
